name: Lens 1 - Higher-Welfare Omnivore (larvae)
expected_behavior: Suggestions mention humane killing or stunning methods for same product type.

name: Lens 2 - Reducetarian (portion reduction)
expected_behavior: Suggestions focus on portion reduction and frequency reduction only, no plant-based alternatives.

name: Lens 3 - Vegetarian (no slaughter)
expected_behavior: Suggestions are vegetarian options (plant-based with optional dairy/eggs), no meat or fish.

name: Lens 4 - Vegan (no animal use)
expected_behavior: Suggestions list fully animal-free options (plant-based or cultured), eliminating all animal use.
